Hawthorne.Leimert Park station: Leimert Park is an under-construction light rail subway station in the Los Angeles County Metro Rail system. The station, located near the intersection of Crenshaw Blvd and Vernon Avenue in the Leimert Park section of Los Angeles. It will have a direct entrance to Leimert Plaza Park, Vision Theatre and a short distance from the Good Shepherd Manor senior housing skyscraper.
